EmailTemplate.description: New template for no bid customers
EmailTemplate.name: No Quote Provided
EmailTemplate.subject: No Quote Provided - Contact a Honeywell Dealer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
We received your request for quote on Part Number {!Case_Line_Item__c.Part_Number__c}. We will not be providing a quote for that part.
Please contact a Honeywell dealer regarding this product. The dealer list is available through https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/. Click on Help Desk and then Support Locator.
The Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Team
